version_description:
-Get your chef's hat ready, the all new restaurant is now available in Dr. Panda Town! This new area lets you be a waiter or chef, cook for your customers, take your friends to dinner, and even make deliveries!

*The restaurant area is available via a one-time In-App Purchase which will unlock the area forever.

Enjoy playing along in Dr. Panda Town? Leave us a review and share your fun stories! Have feedback? Leave us a message​ at support@drpanda.com.

- Cleaned up around town and squashed some bugs

Enjoy playing along Dr. Panda Town? Leave us a review and share your fun stories! Have feedback? Leave us a message​ at support@drpanda.com.

New Feature: Costume Designer
Choose from tons of clothing to make new costumes, and dress up your characters in all new ways!

Dr. Panda Town is now bigger and better!  

- Dr. Panda Town, Mall, Vacation and Pet World have come together in one huge app! It’s never been easier to play everywhere.
- New Submarine area added! It’s time to take command and submerge to the depths of the ocean as you dive into the waters of Dr. Panda Town! 
- Bring in any areas you’ve already unlocked in other Dr. Panda Town games.
- Subscribe and unlock all areas, characters, and features--including the new submarine, and any other new content added in future updates!

Don’t forget to leave a review and tell us what you’d like to see us build in Dr. Panda Town: Collection!

We've made a couple of changes to fix bugs and improve Dr. Panda Town. We hope you continue to enjoy it.
If you have any feedback or comments, leave a review or tell us what you think at support@drpanda.com

- Cleaned up the Lunar New Year decorations and costumes
- Minor improvements

And there's more to do in other Dr. Panda Town games too! Check out two all-new areas in Dr. Panda Town: Vacation! Uncover the mysteries of the ancient ruins, or dive to the depths of the underwater city.
If you have any feedback, leave a review or send us a message at support@drpanda.com

- Minor improvements and bug fixes
Enjoy playing along in Dr. Panda Town? Leave us a review and share your fun stories! Have feedback? Leave us a message​ at support@drpanda.com.

Guess what! We've made Dr. Panda Town even better! Thanks to everybody who took the time to share their thoughts on how we could improve it.

- Be sure to check Dr. Panda Town: Mall, now with a brand new arcade and playground!
- Some mysterious new characters have moved to Dr. Panda Town. Can you find them all?

Check it out and let us know what you like best by leaving a review!

We've made a couple of changes to fix bugs and improve Dr. Panda Town. We hope you continue to enjoy it.  

-Fixed an issue where sometimes the game would get stuck between areas
-An all-new Dr. Panda Town app is here! Check out Dr. Panda Town: Pet World to discover an enchanted theme park with rides, a magical castle, pet hotel and more!

If you have any feedback or comments, leave a review or tell us what you think at support@drpanda.com

We've made a couple of changes to fix bugs and improve Dr. Panda Town. We hope you continue to enjoy it.
If you have any feedback or comments, leave a review or tell us what you think at support@drpanda.com

Happy Lunar New Year! We've given Dr. Panda Town an awesome revamp in celebration of the holiday! Download now to join in the festivities and check out the cool new additions!
- Decorated the town for Lunar New Year!
- Added all-new outfits for Lunar New Year.  
- Celebrate with fireworks!  
- Show off your cooking skills! Make tasty Chinese dumplings in the restaurant.  
- Added all sorts of fun items like drums and more! 

If you have any feedback, leave a review or send us a message at support@drpanda.com

- Cleaned up the Lunar New Year decorations and costumes
- Minor improvements

And there's more to do in other Dr. Panda Town games too! Check out two all-new areas in Dr. Panda Town: Vacation! Uncover the mysteries of the ancient ruins, or dive to the depths of the underwater city.
If you have any feedback, leave a review or send us a message at support@drpanda.com

- Bring in any areas you’ve already unlocked in other Dr. Panda Town games.

Don’t forget to leave a review and tell us what you’d like to see us build in Dr. Panda Town: Collection!

Choose from tons of clothing to make new costumes, and dress up your characters in all new ways!
